Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe this product would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $18000, reflecting its high quality and unique features. We are confident it will provide substantial value to you, surpassing the investment you make today. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
